devdoc.details: Manually encodes and decodes the global Position struct into storage.      (external-safe): this library is safe to externalize     struct StoredPositionGlobal {         /* slot 0 */         uint32 timestamp;         uint32 __unallocated__;         uint64 maker;         uint64 long;         uint64 short;         /* slot 1 */         uint64 maker (deprecated);         uint192 __unallocated__;     }
